input.sentences: [female] went to the mountain to go skiing .
some of the cliffs were very high with snow hanging off of them .
[female] had to work hard to get up some of the hills .
when she made it to the top she was ready to go down .
[female] loved the feeling of zooming down the slopes .
output.sentences: Who says a female can't go mountain skiing?
I decided to give it a try but got a bit scared when I saw the snow hanging from the cliffs.
I think uphill skilling would be hard for a male or a female.
Once I was at the top I felt I was ready.
I loved zooming down those slopes!
